short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Incident Tracker extension from Spike, get your incident details right in your browser extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For customers using Spike.sh, you can now track and keep an eye on all your incidents using this extension. 

Key points - 

1. Easy setup
2. Safe and secure
3. Refreshes and syncs the total open incidents every 45 seconds
4. Privacy focused. We cannot access any of the websites you visit or the data you enter.
